panels

Class SingleSelectionModel<ItemType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<E>
      • javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<ItemType>
        • panels.SingleSelectionModel<ItemType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ItemType - the type of item that this model contains.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ComboBoxModel<ItemType>, javax.swing.ListModel<ItemType>, javax.swing.MutableComboBoxModel<ItemType>

    public class SingleSelectionModel<ItemType>
extends javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<ItemType>
    A model where the user can select a single item from a list of a given type. This object can be listened for changes made by the user. Changes can also be made programmatically.

    To listen for selection changes, attach and use the callback in ListDataListener.contentsChanged(javax.swing.event.ListDataEvent).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
